Class

Description

[BaseLlm](BaseLlm.html "class in com.google.adk.models")

Abstract base class for Large Language Models (LLMs).

[BaseLlmConnection](BaseLlmConnection.html "interface in com.google.adk.models")

The base class for a live model connection.

[Claude](Claude.html "class in com.google.adk.models")

Represents the Claude Generative AI model by Anthropic.

[Gemini](Gemini.html "class in com.google.adk.models")

Represents the Gemini Generative AI model.

[Gemini.Builder](Gemini.Builder.html "class in com.google.adk.models")

Builder for [`Gemini`](Gemini.html "class in com.google.adk.models").

[GeminiLlmConnection](GeminiLlmConnection.html "class in com.google.adk.models")

Manages a persistent, bidirectional connection to the Gemini model via WebSockets for real-time interaction.

[LlmRegistry](LlmRegistry.html "class in com.google.adk.models")

Central registry for managing Large Language Model (LLM) instances.

[LlmRegistry.LlmFactory](LlmRegistry.LlmFactory.html "interface in com.google.adk.models")

The factory interface for creating LLM instances.

[LlmRequest](LlmRequest.html "class in com.google.adk.models")

Represents a request to be sent to the LLM.

[LlmRequest.Builder](LlmRequest.Builder.html "class in com.google.adk.models")

Builder for constructing [`LlmRequest`](LlmRequest.html "class in com.google.adk.models") instances.

[LlmResponse](LlmResponse.html "class in com.google.adk.models")

Represents a response received from the LLM.

[LlmResponse.Builder](LlmResponse.Builder.html "class in com.google.adk.models")

Builder for constructing [`LlmResponse`](LlmResponse.html "class in com.google.adk.models") instances.

[Model](Model.html "class in com.google.adk.models")

Represents a model by name or instance.

[Model.Builder](Model.Builder.html "class in com.google.adk.models")

Builder for [`Model`](Model.html "class in com.google.adk.models").

[VertexCredentials](VertexCredentials.html "class in com.google.adk.models")

Credentials for accessing Gemini models through Vertex.

[VertexCredentials.Builder](VertexCredentials.Builder.html "class in com.google.adk.models")

Builder for [`VertexCredentials`](VertexCredentials.html "class in com.google.adk.models").
